resNameAdd:
1) Asmat Ali and 3 Ors
    Advocate - Shanti Uddin Sheikh

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused persons Asmot Ali, Joynal Abedin, Nerina Khatun and Nur Hosen are present. Judgment ready and delivered in open court.  Prosecution totally failed to bring home charge u/s 366A/342/355 IPC r/w section 4 of POCSO Act against the accused person Asmot Ali and prosecution totally failed to bring home charge u/s 366A/342/355 IPC against the accused persons Joynal Abedin, Nerina Khatun and Nur Hosen. Accordingly accused Asmot Ali is acquitted from the charge of section 366A/342/355 IPC r/w section 4 of POCSO Act and accused persons Joynal Abedin, Nerina Khatun and Nur Hosen are acquitted from the charge of section 366A/342/355 IPC and  set at liberty.Bail bond of accused persons will remain stands for next six (6) months u/s 437(A) Cr.P.C. Case is disposed of on contest.
